name: Reactivate an account when a deactivated user tries a new register
scenarioId: classpath:features/user/create_user:Reactivate an account when a deactivated user tries a new register
methodName: Reactivate an account when a deactivated user tries a new register

testSteps.description: Given a client with name "Jhonny", surname "Doe", document type "NATIONAL_ID", document "123465", country "PT"
And there is a client with the document type "NATIONAL_ID", document "123465", country "PT"
When the account activation is requested
Then the client's register and account are reactivated
And the user data is updated

userStory.narrative:
To be able to be a client of the Tiny Bank, the user must register and create an account with the bank.

  **As a** person that wants to become a Tiny Bank client
  **I want to** provide my registration information
  **So that I can** have an active bank account

title: Reactivate an account when a deactivated user tries a new register

rule.name: When the person is a client with already existing national document registered in Tiny Bank, the client's account can be reactivated
